solution_line_template: He bought {books_per_month}*{cost_per_book}=$<<{books_per_month}*{cost_per_book}={cost_per_month}>>{cost_per_month} of books a month
That means he bought {cost_per_month}*{months_per_year}=$<<{cost_per_month}*{months_per_year}={cost_per_year}>>{cost_per_year} of books a year
